text: læa reā midị̂ s̄̀ng p̄hū̂ dı mā k̀xn cêā nxkcāk brrphburus̄ʹ cāk chāw meụ̄xng thī̀ reā h̄ı̂ wa ḥī kæ̀ phwk k̄heā phwk k̄heā midị̂ trawen pị nı p̄hæ̀ndin dxk h̄rụ̄x pheụ̄̀x phwk k̄heā ca h̄ĕn bậnplāy k̄hxng brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀mā k̀xn phwk k̄heā ẁā pĕn xỳāngrị læa næ̀nxn lok xā khi reāa ḥ̒ nận dī yìng s̄ảh̄rạb brrdā p̄hū̂ yảkerng phwk th̀ān midị̂ chı̂ s̄tipạỵỵā dxk h̄rụ̄x
